Synergy::

The Guardian makes no apologies for her behavior, but she appears to 
be considering Darkangel's offer.  "Maybe.  I'd like to meet the head 
nutcase of this clown act before I decide one way or the other."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Darkangel : :
> Darkangel: We apologize for asking so many questions. But it is 
surprising to see a Guardian Robot functioning in this day and age. 
Are you looking to join faction?
> 
> 
> cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> "What is this, anyway?"  Synergy takes a menacing step 
forward.  "I'm 
> not in the mood to play Twenty Questions!"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Dreadplague: And what brings you to Earth now?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > Synergy glares down at the technorganic-2 femme.  "'Letting' 
had 
> > > nothing to do with it," she growls.  "I left, plain and 
simple.  
> The 
> > > Autobots were too busy cracking heads with the Decepticons to 
go 
> > > looking for me at the time, and afterwards they forgot about 
me."
> > >

> hurt, as 
> > > she 
> > > > > test-fires the napalm cannon built into the center of her 
> claw - 
> > > > > reducing a nearby shrub to a scorch mark on the 
> ground. "Hmmm.

wished

dangerous
